text: The Scarlet Empress is a 1934 American romantic historical drama movie directed by Josef von Sternberg and starring Marlene Dietrich, John Lodge, Sam Jaffe, C. Aubrey Smith, Louise Dresser, Olive Tell, Erville Alderson. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1934 romantic drama movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Josef von Sternberg Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in the 18th century
title: The Scarlet Empress
